column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Canyon guide says : " Okay , everyone stand clear of the wall . "
#Text=Aang says : " Why 'd you do that ? "
#Text=Canyon guide says : " These people are fleeing the Fire Nation , are n't they ?
#Text=Okay , now we got ta help me !
#Text=" Aang says : " What was that ?
#Text=" Canyon guide says : " Canyon crawler .
#Text=And there 's sure to be more !
#Text=" Katara says : " Your arms , they 're broken !
#Text=" Canyon guide says : " Without my arms , I got no bending .
#Text=In other words - " Aang says : " We 're trapped in this canyon .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I thought the whole point of ditching our food was so we would n't have to deal with things like canyon crawlers .
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " It 's the Zhangs !
#Text=They took food down here even after the canyon guide told them not to .
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " What ?
#Text=If there 's anyone who ca n't go without food for a day , it 's you pampered Gan Jins !
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " I hope you 're happy .
#Text=We 're stuck in this canyon with no way out .
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " Why do n't you thank yourself , food hider ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Look , sticking together is the only way to - " Zhang leader says : " I 'm not walking another step with the likes of them !
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " Now there 's something we can agree on .
#Text=" Aang says : " Any ideas ?
#Text=" Canyon guide says : " No bendng ... we need to get out of this canyon ... I wo n't die down here !
#Text=I wo n't become part of the food chain !
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " See !
#Text=We 're going to become part of the food chain because of you !
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " Sure , unjustly blame the Zhangs like you always do !
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " Gladly .
#Text=" Aang says : " Enough !
#Text=I thought I could help you guys get along , but I guess that 's not gon na happen .
#Text=We should split up , Gan Jins on this side and Zhangs on that side .
#Text=We 'll travel in two separate lines .
#Text=Sokka , you go with the Zhangs and Katara , you go with the Gan Jins .
#Text=See if you can find out why they hate each other so much .
#Text="
